      Parameters:
      code - code to be evaluated
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      hours - num of hours to be evaluated
      Returns:

    • isValidFields

      private boolean isValidFields​(java.lang.String deptCode, Date date, double salary, int mgmtCode)
      helper method to determine if various fields are valid
      Parameters:
      deptCode - department code to be evaluated
      date - date object to be evaluated
      salary - salary to be evaluated
      mgmtCode - management code to be evaluated
      Returns:
      true if all are valid, false otherwise
